name: Migrants (ColonyGameStudio, TobiasNorum, GDPanda)
description:
Blend in as a spy, work as a civillian or find the spies by joining the police force.

The game is multiplayer and we reccomend that it should be played with at least 4 players. One player needs to host, while the others connect. This can be done either through the same local network (and the other players type in the host-ip) or port forwarding at this point in time. We do not have any servers.

(You can change the IP and port from the main menu)

When the game is hosted, before starting the game, the host has access to a host-menu. In this menu you can change multiple settings, such as time, walking speed etc. You are welcome to try this out and see what is fun.

POSTERS AND TRAILER MP4:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/17ouVIZwyy6quiMbo9YsIQAUVmbzJseJL?usp=sha...
